snippet.title: Little Racers Trailer - Xbox Live Indie Games
snippet.description:
Trailer for Little Racers, an arcade racing game made by Milkstone Studios for Xbox Live Indie Games.

Currently version 1.3 is available.

The game features online multiplayer, good-looking skidmarks, lots of different cars, each one with its own behavior, many tracks, championship mode, ghost laps, AI racers, and much more.

More information available on http://www.milkstonestudios.com
